django.db.models.utils
======================

.. py:module:: django.db.models.utils


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.db.models.utils.AltersData


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.db.models.utils.make_model_tuple
   django.db.models.utils.resolve_callables
   django.db.models.utils.unpickle_named_row
   django.db.models.utils.create_namedtuple_class


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: make_model_tuple(model)

   Take a model or a string of the form "app_label.ModelName" and return a
   corresponding ("app_label", "modelname") tuple. If a tuple is passed in,
   assume it's a valid model tuple already and return it unchanged.


.. py:function:: resolve_callables(mapping)

   Generate key/value pairs for the given mapping where the values are
   evaluated if they're callable.


.. py:function:: unpickle_named_row(names, values)

.. py:function:: create_namedtuple_class(*names)

.. py:class:: AltersData

   Make subclasses preserve the alters_data attribute on overridden methods.
